Kandi had to fulfill her previous engagements that was signed up before this reunion. Broadway being one of them (which is where she is at now). She couldn't break those contracts. Therefore, she and the rest of the ladies agreed that she finish those and then return. They're doing a part 2 of the tour as well. She's coming back, she didn't leave. She just won't be on this EP right now. It's just business, nothing personal. Stop blaming the rest of the group. "It wasn't successful without Kandi before." Yeah, well that was a different era, circumstance, and situation, for Xscape. It's not that way now. And y'all are just going have deal with the 3 T's of the group for right now.
